about_the_game:
You can check in any time you like ...

The Intermine Legacy: I am the Darkness is an anime-inspired, dark fantasy visual novel set within a creepy, underground cryogenics facility called Intermine Laboratories. At one time a beacon of hope for humanity's survival, its foundations have given way to decay, allowing nature to reclaim what rightfully belongs to her. It's become Intermine Laboratories' policy to void all cryogenic contracts and leave patients in stasis — indefinitely. That is, until Joseph McPherson, Eric Eastwick and William McKinley are inexplicably awoken from their eternal slumber and left to uncover the secrets behind Intermine's downfall.

The Beginning of the End

There is much more going on behind the scenes of Intermine Laboratories. Hiding in the shadows are a legion of genetic abominations, cannibals and more. If you're going to guide Joseph, Eric and William out of this twisted labyrinth, you'll need to familiarize yourself with your surroundings. What are the Tenebrae? The Nox? Where are your loved ones? Just why did you come to Intermine Laboratories in the first place? Each of these questions — and many more — will be answered in The Intermine Legacy: I am the Darkness!



In The Intermine Legacy: I am the Darkness, you will play as (and encounter) a wide variety of interesting characters with compelling stories to tell. Here's just a taste of what's in store.













Features Included in The Intermine Legacy: I am the Darkness:

  • A creepy, anime-inspired world crafted over the course of fifteen real-world years.
  • Characters and BGs created by A Sleepy Witch's Atelier.
  • An encyclopedic database of world-building written (in-universe) by a highly-advanced (and sarcastic) AI.
  • An original soundtrack by indie musician Bannister Chaava.

content_descriptors.notes: The Intermine Legacy: I am the Darkness contains potentially triggering topics for some players, including violence, death, gore and suicidality. It should be noted that these topics are not incredibly prevalent in the game, but they do exist.

short_description: Follow Joseph, Eric, and William (as well as a handful of other characters) as they awake from cryogenic stasis at the enigmatic facility known as Intermine Laboratories. But, deep within the abyss exists an ancient evil that is seeking to enact its own twisted machinations ...
